      • getStereoByteArray

        public byte[] getStereoByteArray()
        Get byte array of processed audio. This can be used for addition with other audio data for full output playback.

      • getStereoFloatArray

        public float[] getStereoFloatArray()
        Get byte array of processed audio. This can be used for addition with other audio data for full output playback.
